dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset containing 10 classes of 50,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, commonly used for evaluating machine learning algorithms in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks
Thomas Dietterich
dcterms:description: CIFAR-C is a corrupted variant of CIFAR-10 that includes 19 corrupted subsets categorized into noise, blur, weather, and digital transformations, each with five levels of severity.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-C
